name: Gin & Waffles 2
description:
Controls: Mouse! Move the top part by dragging.

#GMTK - An Out Of Control Card Game!

What happened to Ginny this time you ask?
Well, another freak accident of course!
A freak accident when she was emptying her shopping cart
as her phone beeps and SUDDENLY!

"FREE WAFFLES UNTIL MIDNIGHT!"

OF COURSE She had to move quickly!
She was about to put aside her chopping cart to head over to the waffle bar.. again
when she suddenly tripped over Rubble the dog and fell right into the shopping cart
which went off unstoppable and with highspeed towards her beloved waffles.

In her hurry she also forgot the directions to the waffle bar.. again.
But what does it matter?
Unless you help her over pitfalls and bridges she will never get to the free waffles!

For those curious "2nd? Where's the 1st?" 
Gin and Waffles 1 can be found ~Here~ Which was our very first gamejam, submitted for GMTK 2018 - A game without Mechanics.
Ginny had no control then, so when we heard the theme it was a no brainer!
